name: ampi-node
description: AMPi is a project that integrates a mains electricity power supply with an audio amplifier, an 4-channel audio relay switcher, input audio transformers, a Raspberry PI with DAC, a ST7735 based TFT display, and an Arduino Nano (to control the Raspberry Pi over serial and the built-in screen) to make a completely integrated digital audio solution that supports the latest high quality internet audio streaming and smart speaker AirPlay & Bluetooth 4.2 functionality over either wired Ethernet or Wi-Fi in one box.
